title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.11 - Re-ending and piecing tubes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.11 - Re-ending and piecing tubes

State Regulations

Re-ending or piecing of tubes or pipes in either fire
tube or water tube boilers is permitted provided the thickness of the remaining
tube or pipe is not less than 90 percent of that required by the applicable
section of the ASME Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-3.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
